onBoardingTitle2: See a list of all the Events and speakers.
onBoardingTitle3: Get to know the speakers and their events.
onBoardingSubTitle1: The app includes a map of the venue, so you can easily find your way to your sessions and exhibits.
pleaseEnterValidPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, and a number
pleaseEnterValidEmailAddress: Please enter a valid email address
pleaseEnterValidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number.
youCantSelectMoreThan5Interests: You can't select more than 5 interests.
typeYourRegisteredEmailToReceivePINCode: Type your registered email to receive PIN code.
noCategoriesFoundTryAgainLater: No categories found, try again later.
earnEverydayachancetowinafreeeventticket: Earn every day a chance to win a free event ticket. Collect points now after spinning the wheel.
spinAndWinInstructions: Spin the wheel and replace it with a free event ticket when you reach 1000 points. The redeem button will be unlocked so you can get the ticket!
redeemButtonActivation: When you reach 1000 points, the redeem button will be activated!
redeemTicketInstructions: You will fill a form to redeem your ticket. You can select up to 3 events. Select the most priority favorite events. You will get the ticket by priority. If the first priority is sold out, you will gain the second priority, etc.
joinOurGreatEvents: Join our great events in Evntown. Enjoy your favorite event for free!
